content:
This is my new reading/books blog, where I will write reviews of books I’ve read, chart progress on books that I’m reading, and anything else literary-related that I can think of.
It is using the same setup as my main https://davidcraddock.net blog - as in - it’s self-hosted, and uses the Hugo Go-based static blogging engine.

title: New Books Blog
